thread.title: This Just In: Obese men last longer in bed (4 Photos)
thread.title_full: This Just In: Obese men last longer in bed (4 Photos)

author: Shelbie
title: This Just In: Obese men last longer in bed (4 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
If you saw the dad bod fad come and go and realized that you were just a little over the weight limit to be a part of that club, never fear. You might be happy to hear the latest (and very important ) scientific discovery. According to scientists, obese men last longer during sex than skinny guys do. So if you’re date night consists of a personal large pizza for the both of you, you might be in for a good time. 2 GIF 
Researchers at Turkey’s Erciyes University conducted a study called “Insight on pathogenesis of lifelong premature ejaculation: inverse relationship between lifelong premature ejaculation and obesity” and found that obese men last 7.5 minutes during sex, compared to thinner men’s average of six minutes. This is due to a higher amount of estradiol in their bodies, which is a female sex hormone that can suppress the male orgasm. In case you haven’t put two and two together, a suppressed orgasm means longer sex sessions. 3 GIF 
Before anyone gets their panties in a twist, no one is saying you should be obese. There are obvious implications to an excess of fatty foods. However, it’s a proven fact that those who suffer from premature ejaculation are thinner than men who keep it up for a while. 
So, there’s that. 4 
On the flip side, Santa Chiara Regional Hospital in Trento, Italy conducted a study and found that women who eat healthier (specifically women who apples regularly) have better sex lives. 
So ladies, an apple a day keeps the doctor and the sex blues away, and as for you men? Turning those apples into a sugary, delicious, buttery pie every now and then won’t hurt you in the sack.
